item.title: Unlearn Everything
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: React has changed the way we write web applications.To begin with, React is not easy because it requires an open mind.In this session I will talk about the “best practices” put in discussion by React giving, for each one, the answers I gave myself to accept the change and some ideas to work out of […]
item.content:encoded: React has changed the way we write web applications.To begin with, React is not easy because it requires an open mind.In this session I will talk about the “best practices” put in discussion by React giving, for each one, the answers I gave myself to accept the change and some ideas to work out of the comfort zone.
